alert.note: Alert for Benton; DeSoto; Marshall; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 3:50AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto, Marshall, eastern Tate, northwestern Benton, Fayette, western Hardeman and southeastern Shelby Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 350 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Collierville to Byhalia to near Independence. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Holly Springs, Bolivar, Lamar, Whiteville, Somerville, Byhalia, Snow Lake Shores, Mt Pleasant, Michigan City, Red Banks, Barr, Canaan, Lagrange, Independence, Slayden, Marianna, Warren, Macon and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
